metadata.title: CVE-2019-17565 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a vulnerability in Apache Traffic Server 6.0.0 to 6.2.3, 7.0.0 to 7.1.8, and 8.0.0 to 8.0.5 with a smuggling attack and chunked encoding. Upgrade to versions 7.1.9 and 8.0.6 or later versions.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
